name: Verify user is able to download all pdf report

testSteps.description: 1: Verify user is able to download all pdf report ({Store=UAE L2, Start Date=01-01-2022, Level=Level2, Product Category=Vaccine Routine, Storage Temperature=+5C Capacity, Start Month=08-2022})

children.description: Given User is on home page of SMT application
And User is able to see login button on home page
Validate login button on home page
When User click on login button
Click login button
And User click on Proceed To Login button in "English"
Click proceed to login button: English
Then User login as "Store Operator"
User login: Store Operator
And User click on "Apply" button
Click on button: Apply
And User click on "Reports" tab
Click on tab: Reports
And User wait for "20" seconds
Given User type and select "UAE L2" from "Store" in "Reports" tab
Type and select value from dropdown: UAE L2, Store
And User wait for "2" seconds
When User enter "01-01-2022" in "startDate"
Enter text in textbox: 01-01-2022, startDate
And User click on "Generate Report" button
Click on button: Generate Report
And User wait for "3" seconds
Then Reports Data is visible in table to user
Validate data in table
And User click on Export Report button
Click export button
And User click on Export PDF button
Click export PDF button
And User wait for "10" seconds
And User press escape button on keyboard
Press escape key of keyboard
And User wait for "2" seconds
Then User validate UI and "PDF" data for "Arrivals"
Validate UI and PDF data: Arrivals
Get data in PDF
